basic.floral_language:
Echeveria runyonii cv
Floriography: lovely, bold, pure
Echeveria runyonii cv has a dark gray-green to light blue leaf color, flat leaf blade with a tip, closely arranged in rosette, a thin layer of white powder on leaf surface, like a blooming lotus. Leaf edges become pink under a great diurnal temperature range and abundant light.
Echeveria runyonii cv likes light, short period of dormancy in summer, shade properly, sometimes blooms with orange flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color gray green to light blue, when sunny leaf edges turning to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, a short period of dormancy in summer, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Avoid water saturation, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering when in dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
